content: Residential account R-1002 in West District uses new Time-of-Use tariff. Peak hours cost $0.20/kWh.
Commercial account C-2008 in East District has demand charges. Monthly peak demand ~150 kW.
Industrial account I-5001 near Central District. Power factor penalty if <0.95. Observed ~0.92 last month.
metadata: PF penalty: 5% surcharge, recommended capacitor bank install

content: Rural account RA-101 expanded net metering for small PV rooftop, offset 300 kWh last billing cycle.
metadata: Location: North District, net meter program: up to 10 kW

content: Low-income assistance program for account R-2020. Bill credit of $30/month applied.
metadata: Qualification: Under 200% federal poverty, recertify annually
